text: Pavel Korostelyov (born 25 November 1978) is a Russian cross-country skier. He competed in the men's sprint event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Russia Category:Cross- country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Yaroslavl
title: Pavel Korostelyov
